Text: Dude. I love your uploads. I have one request, could you possibly upload all the matches in the world cup in 320p or higher? thanks

@lilars: Thank you.

@Gublet: I would watch ALL games on TV, I always do (11 WCs so far). If I see some game with anthological value (what I doubt judging from the direction taken on last one in Germany) I would encode such game, definitely. So far, nothing good and obnoxious frikkin Vuvuzela Horns.

thanks 2040...
so which team you are supporting this time?

I always have been sympathetic for US team. I spotted their certain uniqueness when they beat Portugal while ago. If they play, football looks as it supposed to.
And I like Brazil too, of course.
But so far, only Asian teams have shown the heart...
thanks a lot. You just made my day. atleast do the semi finals & final if you don't like the other games. please .. thanks a ton.
